Package main.java.it.unipr.sql

Class DBUtil

java.lang.Object
main.java.it.unipr.sql.DBUtil
public class DBUtil extends Object
The class DBUtil defines a model for connection and interactions with the SQL database.
Author:
Martina Gualtieri <martina.gualtieri@studenti.unipr.it>, Cristian Cervellera <cristian.cervellera@studenti.unipr.it>
